answerText: differential equations[10] The homogeneous solution of many differential equations can be found by one of these expressions of the solutions, in which each solution is multiplied by a constant and then added together.

question: Question: These equations come in ordinary and partial forms, depending on the type of function involved. For 10 points each: [10] Name these functions which involve the function itself and its derivatives.
